template&lt; class T &gt;
void atomic_notify_all( std::atomic&lt;T&gt;* object );

{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|
template&lt; class T &gt;
void atomic_notify_all( volatile std::atomic&lt;T&gt;* object );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Performs atomic notifying operations.

Unblocks all threads blocked in atomic waiting operations (i.e. {{lc|std::atomic_wait()}}, {{lc|std::atomic_wait_explicit()}}, or {{l2tf std|cpp/atomic/atomic/wait}}) on {{c|*object}}, if there are any; otherwise does nothing.

Equivalent to {{c|object-&gt;notify_all()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|object|pointer to the atomic object to notify}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
(none)

===Notes===
This form of change-detection is often more efficient than simple polling or pure spinlocks.
